mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT_LIST SET STATUS = -1 WHERE MASTER_LICENSE_LIST_OBID = ( SELECT MASTER_LICENSE_LIST_OBID FROM EVENT_LIST WHERE DATE_FORMAT(START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') < DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d %T') AND STATUS = 1 )

UPDATE PARTICIPATE_LIST SET STATUS = -1 WHERE MASTER_LICENSE_LIST_OBID = ( SELECT MASTER_LICENSE_LIST_OBID FROM PARTICIPATE_LIST WHERE DATE_FORMAT(END_APPLY_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') < DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d %T') AND STATUS = 1 )
